Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Extends the authorization of the city of New Rochelle to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the authorization of the city of New Rochelle to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax until December 31, 2027.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the city of New Rochelle to impose an additional sales and compensating use tax
